displayName.description: The display name of this Food Item.

sprite.description: A path to the sprite to use for this Food Item.

effects.description: An object full of gameplay effects.

multiplierCapAdditiveModifier.description: Increase the Multiplier cap by this amount.

spiritBlastPointsModifier.description: Increases the Spirit Blast points by this amount.

spiritBlastPointsPerBallModifier.description: Increases the Spirit Blast points per ball by this amount.

powerupCooldownModifier.description: (DESCRIPTION TO BE CHANGED) I'm still not sure if ZB uses the classic powerup algo or use seconds.

fireballBaseScoreModifier.description: Increases the fireball explosion base score by this amount.

fireballBaseScorePerBallModifier.description: Increases the fireball explosion score per ball by this amount.

spawnStreakModifier.description: Increases the spawnStreak by this amount by this amount.

curveClearSpeedDistanceModifier.description: Decreases the distance reached by the spheres once a Curve Clear has been achieved by this amount.

alwaysHaveMatches.description: If true, the sphere generation algorithm will never generate singles and will always generate at least 2 spheres of the same color.

maxSpinTargetsAdditiveModifier.description: Increases the amount of times targets that reward Free Spins on hit can appear by this amount.

spinTargetChanceMultiplier.description: Multiplies the chance of Free Spin targets appearing by this amount.

activate_power.description: Activates this specific Power, independed of the current profile's equipped Power slots.

chainBlastPointsModifier.description: Increases the points of each Chain Blast explosions by this amount.

chainBlastExplosionRadiusModifier.description: Increases the radius of Chain Blast's explosion by this amount.

chainBonusPointsModifier.description: Increases the points of each Chain Bonus by this amount.

targetsGiveOneSecond.description: If true, targets will give 1 second on shot.

targetValueModifier.description: Increases the value of shot targets by this amount.

curveClearsGiveOneSecond.description: If true, Curve Clears give 1 second.

curveClearPointModifier.description: Increases the amount of Curve Clear points by this amount.

shotSpeedModifier.description: Increases the shot speed of the shooter by this amount.

minSpeedDistanceModifier.description: Increases the distance of the slowest speed by this amount.

comboPointModifier.description: Increases the amount of points given by Combos by comboPoints + (comboPoints + amount).

tenFiveChainBonusMultiplier.description: Multiplies Chain Bonuses by this amount at x10 chain and every x5 chain after.
